Description: [Key:DebugTools_Description:Debug Tools contains a collection of helper skills that you can use to debug mods in a live environment. Includes cheats for adding character points, experience, unlocking waypoints, and more.]

Entries.Text: See the full changelog in the 'Change Notes' tab on the Steam Workshop page.

Changes: Updated localization, added untranslated PR-BR localization xml file.
Made the debug skills unuseable by the AI. This should fix an issue where a controlled party member may get stuck spamming the menu skill.
